spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within 34 yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts 3 sec.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec.

Whenever enemies within 23 yards of the totem deal direct damage, the totem will deal 100% of the damage dealt back to attacker.
Heals the friendly target for 421,245, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 412,741, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 418,727, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 459,483 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 453,914 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 456,956 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 297,575 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 106,428 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 2.0 sec. Maximum 12 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 16,586 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.9 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 390,603 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Totemic Recall affects an additional totem.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 462,025 and an additional 361,480 over 24 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 296,221 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 72,030 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 46 yards for 213336.2.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Healing Rain instantly restores 62,778 health to 5 allies within its area, and its radius is increased by 2 yards.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
The lowest health target of Healing Tide Totem is healed for 30% more and receives 15% increased healing from you for 4 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 951,196 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.
Summons a totem at the target location with 6 million health for 18 sec. 33,527 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
When you cast Healing Rain, each ally with your Riptide on them is healed for 219,506.
Your haste is increased by 25% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
Increases Riptide's duration by 6.0 sec and its healing over time by 20%.

When refreshing Earth Shield, your target is healed for 181,397 for each stack of Earth Shield they are missing.

When refreshing Water Shield, you are refunded 5,000 mana for each stack of Water Shield missing.

Additionally, Earth Shield and Water Shield can consume charges 1.0 sec faster.
15% of Healing Wave's healing from you and your ancestors is duplicated onto each of your targets with Riptide.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Benefiting from Undulation calls an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.

Casting Unleash Life calls an Ancestor to your side for 16 sec.

Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Your Ancestors' spells are 25% more powerful.
Ancestors last an additional 4 sec.

Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.

Riptide gains an additional charge and heals for 20% more.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Riptide by 3 sec.

Increases your maximum mana by 10%.

Tidal Waves can now stack up to 4 times.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Earth Shield has an additional 3 charges and heals you for 25% more.
Increases the healing done by Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Wellspring, Downpour, and Chain Heal by 25%.

When an Ancestor departs, they cast Hydrobubble on a nearby injured ally.

 Hydrobubble
Surrounds your target in a protective water bubble for 15 sec.

The shield absorbs the next 1 million incoming damage, but the absorb amount decays fully over its duration.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.
Heals the friendly target for 422,035, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 413,457, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 416,256, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 451,699 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 386,309 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Healing Rain or Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Casting Healing Rain has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 8 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Healing Rain's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 14 yards for 337,794 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 28,018 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 8,373 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Your Feral Spirits are now imbued with Fire, Frost, or Lightning, increasing your damage dealt with that element by 10%, but now only increase your Physical damage dealt by 10%.
